about_the_game:
* Story

Yuna(player) came to the station of a hot spring on the train.
The goal is to clear her 5 stages and get her to the hot springs.
Many erotic traps and men get in the way in front of Yuna with a single towel.

*Features
The game avoids traps with three actions: “Avoid”, “Run” and “Wait”.
The traps are arranged with fine adjustments. There is always a place to evacuate.
When the heroine comes into contact with the trap, the etch rate increases.
When the etch level reaches 100, the game is over.
Using items can lower the etch level.

Erotic traps are made with original dots, and erotic scenes are made with dot animations.
The real pleasure of this game is not only to avoid traps, but also to see the erotic scenes on purpose.

Go through 5 stages and you will reach the hot spring.
The heroine past is replayed between the stages.
At the end of the game, the purpose of the heroine will be revealed.

The manual is in the in-game folder.

content_descriptors.notes: An action that is played with the chest and genitals. A scene similar to urination. Includes unintended sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: The heroine goes to the hot spring. Erotic traps and men are jealous on the way to the hot spring. Head to the hot spring while avoiding them. The heroine who arrives will know why he came to the hot spring. Traps and animated illustrations are drawn in dot pictures.
